column4: Hello. I'm having X crashes and I'm trying to find the cause.
When it crashes I can move my mouse, and ping my machine from another computer. But I can't do Ctrl + Alt + Backspace, or anything else.
I'm on Xorg7, is this known to be unstable? Or unstable on Dapper?
so I've been told. Can you make any suggestions?
What do you need help with? Installing ATI drivers or something?
